title: Sunny Spacious Bedroom with Private Bathroom in Porter/Davis Squares
posting_body: One Sunny Spacious Bedroom with Private Bathroom
GREAT LOCATION FOR WORK/LIFE SATISFACTION
- 8 mins walk to Porter Square and Davis Square, Redline T Stations, Commuter Rail.
- Bus stops to Arlington and Harvard right outside of the apartment.
- 3 to 8 mins walk to parks, tennis court, basketball/baseball courts, Target, grocery stores and lots of restaurants in the vibrant Porter/Davis square areas.
RENT & LEASING LENGTH
$1200 + utilities,
12-month lease preferred, 6-month possible,
Starting Sep 1, 2022
SHARED SPACE

The apartment has 2-stories, comes with a spacious living room, dining room, kitchen, 2 full bathrooms in addition to the bedroom’s private bathroom, a backyard, a patio, a spacious basement, and friendly neighbors.
The common spaces are fully furnished with 2 big 75” TVs, comfortable couches and spacious dinning set that create a cafe vibe.
You will be taking the 4th bedroom and its private bathroom.
The house also comes with a smaller 5th bedroom that can serve either as an additional living space, guest room, or a room for a 5th roommate.
LAUNDRY
Free laundry machines in basement
ABOUT ROOMMATES
3 roommates are MIT/Northwestern alums in their late 20s and mid-30s - friendly respectful working professionals in journalism, workplace learning, supply chain management, and management consulting.
We like to build a sense of family together and keep the living space clean.

We share various hobbies combined, including holding intellectually stimulating conversations, working out, hanging out, shopping, good food/wines, cooking/baking, board games, karaoke, meeting new people, different cultures, movies and shows, puzzles, traveling, learning something new.
We love to learn about your interests.
We respect the private space each person needs, while we are also open to trying out something new to support one another.
IF INTERESTED:
If interested, please email us with your information: (1) What do you do for a living, (2) Please confirm you can start on September 1st and your leasing length.
(3) A few words about your personalities and what you are looking for in a home/house, (4) Your attitude towards COVID precautions.
